item.title: By: Chris Blatnick
item.dc:creator: Chris Blatnick
item.description: <p>@Steven...Yes, we will make the recording available for download after the webinar.</p><p>Much thanks to Matt for agreeing to help! I think this will be great! :-)</p>
item.content:encoded:
@Steven…Yes, we will make the recording available for download after the webinar.

Much thanks to Matt for agreeing to help! I think this will be great! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I'm sure the slides will be made available by Chris after the event. The only thing to say is certainly my bits won't be too slide heavy so the interesting bits will be in the presentation. Not sure whether you'll be able to replay the whole thing afterwards.</p>
item.content:encoded: I'm sure the slides will be made available by Chris after the event. The only thing to say is certainly my bits won't be too slide heavy so the interesting bits will be in the presentation. Not sure whether you'll be able to replay the whole thing afterwards.

item.title: By: Steven Chapman
item.dc:creator: Steven Chapman
item.description: <p>HI Matt,</p><p>Are you planning to make this will be available to download after the event for those not around on 1st June?</p>
item.content:encoded:
HI Matt,

Are you planning to make this will be available to download after the event for those not around on 1st June?
